participant_1.name: Alex Morgan
participant_1.personality: Ambitious and driven, enjoys engaging conversations and sharing experiences.
participant_1.background: i grew up in manhattan. i graduated from yale in 2011 with a degree in finance. i drive a bmw. i plan to go to business school next year.

participant_2.name: Frank Wilson
participant_2.personality: Laid-back and humorous, enjoys reflecting on life experiences and sharing light-hearted stories.
participant_2.background: i like to grill outdoors. i enjoy mowing my lawn on sunny days. i have been retired for a years. i go gambling in my spare time.
